card.name: Auratouched Mage
card.property: When Auratouched Mage enters the battlefield, search your library for an Aura card that could enchant it. If Auratouched Mage is still on the battlefield, put that Aura card onto the battlefield attached to it. Otherwise, reveal the Aura card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Bathe in Light
card.property: Radiance — Choose a color. Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Benevolent Ancestor
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

card.name: Blazing Archon
card.property: Flying Creatures can't attack you.

card.name: Boros Fury-Shield
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking or blocking creature this turn. If {R} was spent to cast this spell, Boros Fury-Shield deals damage to that creature's controller equal to the creature's power.

card.name: Caregiver
card.property: {W}, Sacrifice a creature: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

card.name: Chant of Vitu-Ghazi
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

card.name: Concerted Effort
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if a creature you control has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, landwalk, protection, trample, and vigilance.

card.name: Conclave Equenaut
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Flying

card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 for each other creature you control.

card.name: Faith's Fetters

card.name: Festival of the Guildpact
card.property: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Flickerform
card.property: Enchant creature {2}{W}{W}: Exile enchanted creature and all Auras attached to it. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, return the other cards exiled this way to the battlefield under their owners' control attached to that creature.

card.name: Gate Hound
card.property: Creatures you control have vigilance as long as Gate Hound is enchanted.

card.name: Ghosts of the Innocent
card.property: If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals half that damage, rounded down, to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Hour of Reckoning
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy all nontoken creatures.

card.property: Activated abilities cost {2} more to activate unless they're mana abilities.

card.property: Search your library for up to three Aura cards with different names, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
